short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create impact by just surfing the web!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
About GoodTab:
	GoodTab is an Initiative by Pledge A Smile Foundation which raises funds for the charity with every browser tab you open!
Pledge A Smile Foundation is a registered Non-Profit Organisation with years of track record. We have helped over 50,000 families directly with many of our projects. 

Aim Of GoodTab:
GoodTab aims to raise funds for our project SEVA which is aimed at not letting any person sleep hungry in this world. So for every 15 Tabs you open, Pledge A Smile will donate a food plate from your side. 

Learn more about Project SEVA: 
	https://pledgeasmile.com/project-seva/

How it works:
	GoodTab will change your new to tab to a custom designed web app by Pledge A Smile Foundation. This tab will have ads which will help us to raise funds without you needing to donate. This way every person can have an impact without needing to donate. We believe through GoodTab, we will be able to provide over 1,000,000 meals in 2022 alone!

For Privacy Policy:
https://pledgeasmile.com/privacy-policy/
